text:
@SenatorLoeffler @SenateGOP @SenatorLoeffler: Now is a time for unity and swift action, not politics as usual.

Like the “swift action” you & hubby took in selling shares of stock, after privileged information on the seriousness of the COVID-19 pandemic?

Totally hypocritical & incredibly shameless.
GREED.
